FuncDef: This command associates a QoS policy with an egress SAP for a mirrored service.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the QoS policy ID to associate with SAP for the mirrored service. The policy ID must already exist. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the queue group redirect list policy name.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
